info.title: SMART TRIAGE SYSTEM
info.description: Comprehensive API for managing emergency room operations including patient triage, doctor workflows, inventory management, and analytics

get.description: Returns the health status of the server
Checks the status of database and Redis connections

post.description: Authenticate user and return JWT tokens
Register a new patient in the system
Perform triage assessment on a patient

get.description: Get detailed information about a patient
Get the current patient queue for a department

patch.description: Update a patient's position in the queue

get.description: Get the current patient queue for doctors

post.description: Order laboratory tests for a patient
Create a medication prescription for a patient
Record vital signs for a patient

get.description: Get medications with low stock levels

post.description: Allocate a resource to a patient
